class AE_manual_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='AE_Manual', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['AE_ManualLearningTasks'] = [
                                        ['School Name', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Area', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Semester', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Year', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Code', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['TeacherImportIdentifier', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['TaskId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsSubjectWide', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['TaskName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['GovtCode1', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentLastName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentFirstName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ResultType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['PrimaryGrade', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CommentTimestamp', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CommentPosterCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CommentPosterName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Result', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ComponentName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ComponentType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsIncludedInReport', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ReportCycleName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DueDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Category', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubmissionStatus', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ReceiptTime', 'string', 'no-op']                                                                 
                                        ]


                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'AE_ManualLearningTasks', self.schemas['AE_ManualLearningTasks'], None, 'BKID')


ae_lt_object = AE_manual_object()
